        public static boolean isWeakPassword(java.lang.String password)
        Determines if the password is weak but , acceptable
        Parameters:
        password - the password to be tested
        Returns:
        if true the password is weak if false the password is not weak

      • isValidPassword

        public static boolean isValidPassword(java.lang.String password)
                               throws LengthException,
                                      NoDigitException,
                                      NoUpperAlphaException,
                                      NoLowerAlphaException,
                                      InvalidSequenceException
        Parameters:
        password - the password to be tested
        Returns:
        if the pass word is valid
        Throws:
        LengthException - if the password is less than 6 characters
        NoDigitException - if the password has no digits in it
        NoUpperAlphaException - if the password has no upper case letters
        NoLowerAlphaException - if the password has no lower letters
        InvalidSequenceException - if the password has the same character in a row more than two times
